faq.question: Why should I pay for an audit when I can just try AI tools myself?
faq.answer: You can do everything with AI, but not everything at the same time. Most companies waste $20K+ on AI tools that sit unused because they lack a strategic implementation plan. An audit gives you a clear roadmap with ROI projections so you invest in the right solutions from day one.

faq.question: What if the audit reveals no good AI opportunities for my business?
faq.answer: If we determine AI isn't a fit for your current business and workflows, we'll tell you upfront and refund 50% of the audit fee. However, we've never had a client where we couldn't identify at least one high-ROI opportunity. (Link to Terms)

faq.question: Do I need to have a technical team to implement your recommendations?
faq.answer: No. We handle all implementation if you choose the Full Implementation package. For Audit/Roadmap clients, we provide detailed documentation and vendor recommendations that any technical partner can execute. We can also refer to implementation partners if needed.

faq.question: How do you measure ROI on AI projects?
faq.answer: We establish baseline metrics during the audit (e.g., time spent on manual tasks, cost per customer interaction) and track improvements post-implementation. Most clients see measurable ROI within 60–90 days through reduced labor costs, faster response times, or increased conversion rates.
